resources.string: %1$s is a fast and lightweight browser produced by %2$s. Our mission is to foster a healthy, open internet.

Double click on the home background to switch themes.
Tap “Yes” to begin seeing news recommended for you by our AI news engine. You can turn off recommendations and control your settings anytime in News->Settings. %1$s
Do you want to disable the recommended news? Tap “YES” to just display the latest news articles.
Do you want to enable the recommended news feature? Tap “YES” to start seeing a recommended selection of news articles.
Your private browsing\nhistory has been erased.

Now you can browse privately, no history, no passwords recorded and other people who use this device won’t see your activity.\n\nOur Advanced Private Browsing can even %1$s by advertisers and websites, which most private modes cannot.
